attributes.action: Free The Boys John Heyfron, David Heyfron & Charkan Guvener !!! And Also Bring Back 'Stepy''
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free these innocent  British Citizens who have been wrongly accused of crimes in Tenerife resort of Playa de las Americas.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
